notAvailableBody: Sorry but this feature is not available (on this device / in this context)

camera.title: Enable Camera
camera.body: Please provide us access to your camera, which is required for scanning your Device QR Code

location.title: Enable Geo-location
location.body: By allowing Geo-location your employee can check in and out

notifications.title: قم بتفعيل الإشعارات
notifications.body: بالسماح لنا للوصول للإشعارات الخاص بك، سوف تسمح للموظف بتسجيل الحضور والإنصراف
